MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area by rerouting the power supply, our team are continuing to work on the underground cable fault in the area and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:39am on 1st April 2021.
